Class LoginManager

java.lang.Object
LoginManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class LoginManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This class contains the login information required from the user. It includes the storing and hashing of the password.
See Also:

    • studentCompare

      public int studentCompare​(java.lang.String inputUsername, java.lang.String inputPassword)
      Compares the student's login input with his account details
      Parameters:
      inputUsername - the username that the user entered
      inputPassword - the password that the user entered
      Returns:
      an int of 1 if the input is correct or a 0 if the input is wrong
